text: RT @NateBoyer37 The 11th Hour of the 11th Day of the 11th Month... #ArmisticeDay100 🇺🇸

RT @CalebJHull . @DanCrenshawTX: 

"There’s a lot of lessons to learn here. Not just that the left and the right can still agree on some things, but also this, Americans can forgive one another. We can remember what brings us together as a country and still see the good in each other." http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1061514225028382720/pu/img/NZO0XknOrgEb0UcC.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1061514225028382720/pu/vid/240x240/w4gQJuPXcY2t3-x-.mp4?tag=5

This Veterans Day we honor the selfless service & unyielding courage of the men & women of our Armed Forces. We say ‘thank you’ to every brave soldier, sailor, airman, marine & coast guardsman who pledge themselves to the defense of our nation, our Constitution & our way of life. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Druf_MWX4AEDgrq.jpg
While we set aside this day to recognize their service, we must commit ourselves to keep America’s promise to our veterans, just as they kept their promise to us.

RT @JimNicar 1931: The large tablet now seen outside the northwest corner of DKR-Texas Memorial Stadium was initially installed on the top row of the north "horseshoe" end zone. Aided by a $10,000 grant from the Texas Legislature, it lists the 5,280 names of Texans who died in World War I. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrwpOvZWoAAgf0E.jpg

My heart goes out to the victims of the California wildfires and their families. These wildfires are not fully contained yet, so please stay alert for any additional evacuation announcements.
https://www.cbsnews.com/live-news/california-fires-camp-malibu-woolsey-evacuation-containment-evacuations-death-toll-live-updates/

RT @WaterboysORG In honor of #VeteransDay, we’re giving away 5 tickets to tonight’s @eagles vs @dallascowboys game! Are you a #Philly area vet, or do you know a vet in Philadelphia that would love to score tickets to tonight’s game? DM us for a chance to win them! #FlyEaglesFly #VeteransDay2018

All 3 of my older brothers served in the military. This #VeteransDay, I’m grateful for the service of our veterans and their families, and I'll keep working with my colleagues in both parties to put them first.

"a certifiable grown-up, and if the Dem House caucus is rational, this former speaker of the House will be the future speaker of the House. [...[  she is the single best legislator in the business. It's that simple: Speaker Pelosi."

On #VeteransDay, we thank those who sacrificed to serve our country. As servicemembers vow to leave no one behind on the battlefield, we vow to leave no veteran behind at home.

Special prayers to the veterans fighting #CaliforniaFires this  #Armistice100. We're all in your debt. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Drux132WkAI_42-.jpg
Took the girls to see Phantom tonight. Great fun. They had a blast! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrxqSv_XQAA3Lq0.jpg

RT @JohnCornyn This #VeteransDay I am thinking of Richard Overton, who is the oldest living U.S. veteran at 112 years old. We were supposed to ride together in the #AustinTx Veterans Day parade but he is recovering from pneumonia.  #GetWellSoon http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrvE6ZCV4AAbyf_.jpg

“Democrats will support our #publicschool educators with respect, resources, and a living wage to show that we value their service as teachers to our children and as parents to their own children.” -NP #Red4Ed #TeamPelosi http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrwHdO0U0AAFJOZ.jpg

On days like this we are reminded of the sacrifices made by all those women and men who have worn the uniform in defense of our nation. We owe our veterans a tremendous debt of gratitude, which we will never truly be able to repay.
Today, Veterans Day, we honor the enormous sacrifice and bravery of the men and women who put their lives on the line to defend our country.

On Monday, we especially honor the memory of millions of Americans, including 200,000 Texans, who served in World War I, a conflict of such devastation that its victorious end became a national holiday eventually dedicated to all Veterans: Armistice Day. #VeteransDay

RT @CoryBooker Today we honor the brave men & women who have served our country. Thank you to all of our veterans & their families who have sacrificed so much for us. This #VeteransDay—& every day—let’s show our veterans how much we appreciate them not just with our words but with our actions.

RT @AudreyWSBTV Shout out to the oldest verified surviving U.S. war veteran, Richard Arvin Overton! Thank you for your service! #VeteransDay http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrvL5eZUUAEFgSX.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrvL5eaVsAAa0r8.jpg

This #VeteransDay, we pause to honor the selfless service and unyielding courage of the men and women of our Armed Forces: https://www.facebook.com/69983322463/posts/10156665372022464/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrufpVhWoAMVdC7.jpg
On this #VeteransDay, and every day, let us thank those who made incredible sacrifices for all of us. God bless them and their families. #ThankYouForYourService

The reports of unsuitable housing conditions at Camp Pendleton are deeply concerning. Members of our military sacrifice so much to keep us safe, it’s critical their housing is safe and sanitary. 
https://timesofsandiego.com/military/2018/11/05/california-senators-call-for-improved-housing-at-camp-pendleton/
Today, in addition to commemorating Veterans Day, we also recognize the centennial of Armistice Day and the end of World War I, a war in which many Vermonters bravely served and lost their lives.

As difficult as it may seem today, we must never lose hope that human beings, and their nations, can resolve international conflicts without bloodshed. We must never cease striving for a world of peace.

My prayers are with everyone affected by the horrific and devastating wildfires in California. Grateful for all of the firefighters and first responders who are bravely risking their lives to save lives and protect communities. https://twitter.com/latimes/status/1061658585564876802 QT @latimes These are all the fires burning in California right now http://www.latimes.com/local/california/la-me-california-fires-woolsey-hill-camp-griffith-park-live-updates-htmlstory.html http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrvE20ZXQAYpPsE.jpg

Today we honor the brave men & women who have served our country. Thank you to all of our veterans & their families who have sacrificed so much for us. This #VeteransDay—& every day—let’s show our veterans how much we appreciate them not just with our words but with our actions.

This Veterans Day, we honor those who have served our nation. Hiring our nation’s veterans is an impactful way that the government can continue to repay these brave heroes for their sacrifice, while also giving them opportunities to continue to serve. https://www.hirevets.gov/

One hundred years later the sacrifice of those who sang ‘we won't come back ‘til it's over, over there’ resounds across the ages, answered with gratitude and fond remembrance in every American heart. #VeteransDay #ThankAVeteran #VeteransDay2018

Texas is home to 1.6 million veterans & our home has a rich tradition of military service. From Fort Bliss to Red River Army Depot from Sheppard Air Force Base to Naval Air Station Kingsville, TX is proud to stand as a pillar in America’s national security. #VeteransDay
